titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the cathedral-church of Worcester at the Lent assize, April 7th, 1688 by Daniel Kenrick, Master of Arts and vicar of Kemsey in Worcestershire.
titleStmt.author: Kenrick, Daniel, fl. 1685.

notesStmt.note: "Allowed to be published this 19th day of June, 1688."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
